titleStmt.title: VVorks of darknes brought to light, or A glance on the mystery of iniquity, carried on in these three nations by the Iesuits, to the utter subversion of religion and government, and an attempt to subject us to popish tyranny: with proposals to prevent the same. By S.W.
titleStmt.author: S. W.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
